00034 #include "DbSolver.hh"
00035 
00036 using namespace TREX::europa;
00037 
00038 /*
00039  * class TREX::europa::DbSolver
00040  */
00041 // structors 
00042 
00043 DbSolver::DbSolver(Assembly const &assembly, EUROPA::TiXmlElement const &cfg) {
00044   m_solver = (new EUROPA::SOLVERS::Solver(assembly.plan_db(), cfg))->getId();
00045 }
00046 
00047 DbSolver::~DbSolver() {
00048   if( m_solver.isId() )
00049     delete (EUROPA::SOLVERS::Solver *)m_solver;
00050 }
00051 
00052 // observers 
00053 
00054 bool DbSolver::noMoreFlaws() const {
00055   EUROPA::IteratorId iter = m_solver->createIterator();
00056   bool ret = m_solver->noMoreFlaws() && iter->done();
00057   delete (EUROPA::Iterator *)iter;
00058   return  ret;
00059 }
00060 
00061 bool DbSolver::inDeliberation(EUROPA::EntityId const &entity) const {
00062   EUROPA::SOLVERS::DecisionStack const &decisions = m_solver->getDecisionStack();
00063 
00064   for(EUROPA::SOLVERS::DecisionStack::const_iterator it=decisions.begin();
00065       decisions.end()!=it; ++it) {
00066     if( entity->getKey()==(*it)->getFlawedEntityKey() )
00067       return true;
00068   }
00069   return false;
00070 }
